headline: Is Vertex Pharmaceuticals Stock Underperforming the S&P 500?
summary: Vertex Pharmaceuticals has lagged the broader S&P 500 Index over the past year, but Wall Street analysts remain moderately optimistic about the company’s long-term prospects.
